text: Àti pé (ìbá lóore fún wọn) tí ó bá jẹ́ pé dájúdájú wọ́n yọ́nú sí ohun tí Allāhu àti Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀ fún wọn, kí wọ́n sì sọ pé: "Allāhu tó wa. Allāhu yó sì fún wa nínú oore àjùlọ Rẹ̀ àti pé Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀ (sì máa pín ọrẹ) , dájúdájú ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu sì ni àwa ń wá oore sí
